Mr. SMITH of Missouri. Mr. Speaker, I move to suspend the rules and  pass the bill (H.R. 5349) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to  improve services provided to taxpayers by the Internal Revenue Service  by providing greater judicial review, as amended.
